name: DARKFECH: TECH DEMO
description:
DARKFECH, by KibbySoft.

In a futuristic gothic future. A ferret named FECH navigates through the woods on his SUPERBIKE and makes it to the bridge to the MASSIVE CASTLE OF THIEVES AND DEMONS and must fight tooth and nail to get inside.

EXPERIENCE a UNIQUE take on the genre of japanese-style character action singleplayer adventure with STORY and THRILLS! And a cooler than cool ferret dude, heck yeah.

Based on FECH THE FERRET, a game by AUCRITAS.
